m_szDocTitle: ITM Power Plc builds anticipation for London’s first hydrogen vehicle refuelling station
m_szDocSumamry: Download PDF version 07:36 04 May 2016 London’s first hydrogen refuelling station, in Teddington, is being launched in collaboration with car markers Toyota, Hyundai and Honda and it is expected to raise market awareness for hydrogen fuel cell vehicles in the UK. Five hydrogen refuelling stations are due to be opened in London this year. ITM Power plc ( LON:ITM ) told investors that its first hydrogen car refuelling station in London will be opened on Tuesday May 10.
